    • logNewStudent

      public static unit3project.Student logNewStudent​(javax.swing.JPanel panel, int num, javax.swing.JTextField nameField, javax.swing.JTextField score1Field, javax.swing.JTextField score2Field, javax.swing.JTextField score3Field)
      Collects and stores student information in a new Student object
      Parameters:
      panel - - GUI window that contains text fields
      num - - Student number (either a 1 or 2)
      nameField - - text field to collect a student's name
      score1Field - - text field to collect a student's first test score
      score2Field - - text field to collect a student's second test score
      score3Field - - text field to collect a student's third test score
      Returns:
      a Student with specified name and three test scores
